comment._content: I can't find a picture of that bust -- looks like Gen. George McClellan

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This photo is printed in several newspapers, p.e. Rock Island Argus., September 02, 1913, HOME EDITION, Page 2 The San Francisco call., August 18, 1913, Page 2 Grafly was mandated to create an heroic sculpture of the "Pioneer Mother". (The newspapers don't say who is reproduced with the portrait bust.)

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for locating these articles, B-59. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update
